attributes.action: All serving and former British Politicians can and should 'go do one.'
attributes.additional_details: Whilst we are unsure what the value of 'one' is, what getting 'one done' would entail, or where exactly it is one would 'go' to do one's 'one', we the undersigned are of the unreservedly resolute opinion that each serving and former British Politician, regardless of party, merit or creed, can and should be compelled to 'go do one'.
